fxInfo_aggregation: Same transformation rule as for "v2x_polyarchy_3C/_4C/_5C" above.
fxInfo_clarification: These are ordinalized versions of the V-Dem clean elections index. The original index ranges from 0 to 1. These transformations offer three different ordinal versions with three (_3C), four (_4C), and five (_5C) levels respectively.
fxInfo_question: To what extent are elections free and fair?
name: e_v2xel_frefair_3C /_4C /_5C
